init

await Select a branch
snapshot
cmp stdout prompt

feed 12
await
snapshot
cmp stdout filter

feed 7 <Enter>

-- branches --
[
  {"branch": "main"},
  {"branch": "foo", "base": "main", "changeID": "#123"},
  {"branch": "bar", "base": "foo", "changeID": "#127"},
  {"branch": "baz", "base": "bar"},
  {"branch": "qux", "base": "baz"}
]
-- prompt --
Select a branch:
      ┏━■ qux ◀
    ┏━┻□ baz
  ┏━┻□ bar (#127)
┏━┻□ foo (#123)
main
-- filter --
Select a branch:
┏━■ bar (#127) ◀
foo (#123)
-- want --
bar
